item.title: Engineering Manager - Anonymous Social Gaming Company
item.description: A fresh new startup I was the first hire for a funded new social media gaming company still operating in stealth mode. I was brought in to build the company game frameworks, based on PixiJS, and build two teams of developers, one in Australia and one in the Philippines. We’ve already built multiple online games for the Australian and international markets and are in the process of launching them and building more.

item.title: Senior Game Developer - Blake eLearning
item.description: Back to a steady job Blake eLearning (now 3p Learning) is an Australian-owned, global provider of quality educational products for children to use at school and at home. At this point we had a young family, and I was looking for a more stable job, one in EdTech making educational games was a perfect fit. I had a great time there, developing games and building game frameworks for the company’s products.

item.title: Game Developer | Animator - Stunt Pixels
item.description: Starting our own game studio Following a successful exit from Next Generation Gaming, two of us decided to start our own game studio. We wanted to create fun, engaging games that were provided to corporate clients. Initially working in Flash, we created games for a range of clients, including games for the Commonwealth Games and the Rugby World Cup. We then diversified and started developing Facebook games, and early social media sites.

item.title: Animator - Next Generation Gaming
item.description: Life at a funded startup Next Generation Gaming was a funded startup that aimed to create the next generation of online games. The company was founded by a who shared a passion for gaming and wanted to create a platform that would revolutionize the gaming industry. I was hired as an animator, but quickly took on additional responsibilities and became a game developer. I worked on over 30 games during my time at Next Generation Gaming, and was responsible for creating animations, graphics, core game engine components, and developing complete social we games.
